item.title: The Joshua Pattern
item.description: The Joshua Pattern Paul Bailey neutron.studio/talks/ But First A Little About Me Born and raised in southern NJ Moved to Houston to work for a NASA contractor met and married Shannon there (married ~21yrs) Software developer for 20 years For fun computer programming triathlon Jim Kautz: Gaining New Knowledge 2 months ago Knowledge is half of the equation We also must be Doers Scriptures Joshua 1:1-9 James 1:21-25 James 2:14-26 Note:
item.content:
The Joshua Pattern

Paul Bailey
neutron.studio/talks/

But First A Little About Me

  • Born and raised in southern NJ
  • Moved to Houston to work for a NASA contractor
    • met and married Shannon there (married ~21yrs)
  • Software developer for 20 years
  • For fun
    • computer programming
    • triathlon

Jim Kautz: Gaining New Knowledge

  • 2 months ago

Knowledge is half of the equation

We also must be Doers

Scriptures

  • Joshua 1:1-9
  • James 1:21-25
  • James 2:14-26

Note:

  • Jews in Egypt 210 years
  • Moses afraid to speak

The Bugs in Our Thinking

  • I’m not good at it: 1 Corinthians 1:26-31
  • I don’t want to: Story of Jonah
  • I done messed up too much: Saul Road to Damascus
  • I’m too old: Abraham & Sarah having a child
    • Thou Shall Prosper: Chapter 10, Never Retire
  • I can’t do it: Paul’s thorn in the flesh

As Bad Movie Once Said

“Never Stop, Never Stopping”
